Package game

Class MainCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • city.cs.engine.Walker
          • game.MainCharacter
  • public class MainCharacter
extends city.cs.engine.Walker
    The player character. Holds all the current and past info about the player (if they acquired a certain item, which direction they're moving in, etc.)

      • MainCharacter

        public MainCharacter​(SuperLevel world,
                     city.cs.engine.Shape shape,
                     int health,
                     int armour,
                     int ammo,
                     int extraJumpsLimit,
                     float dashSpeed,
                     int level)
        Constructor for MainCharacter.
        Parameters:
        world - Current world.
        shape - The hit box of the player.
        health - The health of the player.
        armour - The armour of the player.
        ammo - The ammo of the player.
        extraJumpsLimit - The maximum amount of jumps the player can perform without coming into contact with a solid surface.
        dashSpeed - The dash speed of the player.
        level - The current level the player is on.
